title.rendered: Personal Insurance/Private Client Services – Account Manager

content.rendered:
Do you want to work in a reputable insurance firm as an Account Manager? If yes, you are in the right place. The role of a personal insurance/private client service –  account manager is needed in the city of Toronto, Canada. The role of the services is as described below.

Job Summary

Employer:                                        KRGInsure, A Division of RRJ Insurance Group Limited

City:                                                   Toronto (Ontario)

Job Type:                                          Permanent

Market Segment:                             Insurance

Company Type:                                Insurance Brokerage

Languages Required:                      English

Education Required:                       RIBO

Expertise Area: Broker:                  Broker-Customer Service
Broker: Broker-Personal

Minimum Experience Required:   5 to 6 Years

Job Description

This salaried position is ideal for someone who enjoys providing full service to our Private Client Services clients.  This individual will work within a unit of professionals, with our producers, our insuring partners, and an assigned portfolio of clients handling renewals, and endorsements, assessing risk exposures, providing recommendations for a suitable insurance program, guiding them through claims, and preparing applications and proposals. Suitable candidates should have a solid base of insurance technical knowledge that will enable you to provide the best insurance program and professional expertise for our most esteemed clients.

Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of Personal Lines experience, with preference for servicing high valued homes and automobiles
  • RIBO Licence (active and in good standing) required
  • Other industry qualifications such as CAIB, CIP, etc., would be considered an asset

Skills:

  • A team player with a strong work ethic
  • Excellent interpersonal, presentation, communication and negotiation skills
  • Proven sales ability to round-out accounts
  • An unwavering commitment to delivering professionalism and expertise to our clients
  • Computer proficiency in MS Office products such as Word and Excel
  • Experience with The Agency Manager (TAM) is an asset
  • Experience with insurers such as Chubb, Aviva Ovation, Intact Prestige (GCNA) or Northbridge Onyx is an asset
